QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Twilight Highlands!
QuestData.Description: All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to High Overlord Saurfang in Grommash Hold.$B$BHigh Overlord Saurfang requires your help to prepare for the glorious assault on the Twilight Highlands and our dual enemies, the Alliance and Twilight's Hammer.$B$BMeet with him in Grommash Hold at the center of Orgrimmar's Valley of Strength.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to High Overlord Saurfang at Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.RewardText:
The Horde is going to need heroes to lead our assault on the Twilight Highlands.
Heroes like you, $n.
